revised_title: Mr. Greatrix's Stroke Cures: A Collection of Testimonials
tldr: This article presents various testimonials from individuals who were cured by Mr. Greatrix through his unique healing method, which involves stroking and sometimes using spittle. The author shares several instances of people suffering from various ailments, such as pain, deafness, and the King's Evil, who experienced relief and even complete recovery after Mr. Greatrix's treatments. The author also provides insights into Mr. Greatrix's methods and his success rates with different conditions.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Historical Medicine
